channel.title: Password reset - dosen't send any email
channel.description: hey, i'm trying to reset my Redash password, but after i enter my email address, and click on the 'reset my password' button, i don't get any email to my inbox, can you please validate that this function works? thanks

item.title: Password reset - dosen't send any email
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Yes it works. You haven’t given enough information to debug your situation.

Are you on OSS Redash? Are you an app.redash.io customer?

Read full topic
item.source: Password reset - dosen't send any email

item.title: Password reset - dosen't send any email

item.description:
hey,
i’m trying to reset my Redash password,

i don’t get any email to my inbox,
